movie_title: Learn English with THE OFFICE â€” BEST PRANKS
introduction: Today, you'll learn advanced English vocabulary with The Office, while we discuss our favorite prank

vocabulary.definition: represented as greater than is actually the case
vocabulary.example: They really exaggerated the difficulties in the project to make it seem more challenging.

vocabulary.definition: a practical joke or mischievous act
vocabulary.example: She decided to play a prank on her coworker by filling his office with balloons.
He was so gullible that he believed every story his friend told him.
After the long wait, he became exasperated with the slow service at the restaurant.

vocabulary.definition: a machine that dispenses small articles or food when a coin or token is inserted
vocabulary.example: She bought a snack from the vending machine in the break room.
The competition between the two teams was red hot, with both sides giving their all.
